elements.title: bust of a Chinese gentleman
elements.contents: ... that a bust of a Chinese gentleman (pictured) is not based on any actual subject?

elements.title: commercial for a streaming service
elements.contents: ... that a 15-second commercial for a streaming service has been blamed for causing arguments and domestic violence?

elements.title: Darko Pešić
elements.contents: ... that Darko Pešić ran the 100-metre race at the 2024 Summer Olympics with a broken foot?

elements.title: a work by Herman Melville
elements.contents: ... that the chimney in a work by Herman Melville has been described as a "a bastion of phallic, assertive, and aggressive masculinity"?

elements.title: Robert Brodribb Hammond
elements.contents: ... that Robert Brodribb Hammond established the Sydney suburb of Hammondville to house families made homeless by the Great Depression?

elements.title: fake Buddhist monks
elements.contents: ... that fake Buddhist monks scam tourists out of money to build non-existent temples?

elements.title: Lou Romanoli
elements.contents: ... that Lou Romanoli ran a semi-pro baseball team whose attendances sometimes exceeded that of a nearby MLB team?

elements.title: Hurricane Larry
elements.contents: ... that an Antiguan man who escaped from custody in Canada is suspected of stealing a yacht and sailing it directly into Hurricane Larry?

elements.title: John Papadimitriou
elements.contents: ... that junior archaeologists used to ask John Papadimitriou to walk over their sites for good luck?
